letter.heading: OPEN LETTER
letter.p1: Daiphong Industrial Joint Stock Company respectfully sends greetings and best wishes for health and success to your organization.
letter.p2: With experience in manufacturing and processing MEP products, Daiphong is a trusted partner in supplying ducts, grilles, dampers, cable trays, ladders and accessories.
letter.p3: Our products are widely applied in projects such as high-rise buildings, shopping centers, hospitals, schools, factories, workshops, industrial zones and many other civil and industrial projects nationwide.
letter.p4: With flexible production capacity, standard equipment and a professional technical team, Daiphong is committed to meeting requirements for quality, schedule and cost, bringing sustainable value to every project.
letter.p5: We look forward to becoming a reliable partner and accompanying our customers in current and future projects.
letter.closing: Sincerely thank you and wish your organization sustainable prosperity.

productsSection.heading: Featured products
